(cid:1702)(cid:3442)(cid:5619)(cid:3871)(cid:2858)(cid:5575)(cid:1358)(cid:695)(cid:3629)(cid:4698)(cid:4516)董事長致 辭010(cid:3816)(cid:1323)(cid:1687)歲月不居，天道酬勤。2017年是本行完成股權變
更的開局之年。宏觀經濟逐步從高速增長階段轉向
高質量發展階段，處於風險易發多發期的銀行業面
臨從緊趨嚴政策導向下服務實體經濟、防控金融風
險、深化金融改革等多重機遇與挑戰。本行在廣大
股東、客戶及社會各界的關心支持下，堅決貫徹落
實黨的十九大及中央經濟工作會議、全國金融工作
會議等重要指示精神和監管要求，既穩中求進、負
重前行，又努力拼搏、攻堅克難，經受了來自方方
面面的嚴峻考驗，守住了不發生系統性金融風險的

伏，保護主義明顯抬頭；中國經濟運行穩中向好，
供給側結構性改革初見成效，但發展質量和效益仍
需提升。面對諸多矛盾交織叠加、風險挑戰接踵而
至的複雜形勢，全行上下凝心務本、砥礪奮進，以
黨的十九大精神為指引認真落實監管部門和董事會
的各項要求，以高質量發展導向穩增長、調結構、
強協同、優服務、控風險，經營管理全面進步，持

t021本行堅持“審慎、穩健、中性”原則，聚焦風險防
控核心，把握信息化時代脈動，加強管理制度建
設，努力打造“機器+制度+文化”的內控合規體
系，制度化改造管理流程，提升決策質效，市場化
調整組織體系，激活內生動力，夯實發展基礎，踏
實前進腳步。The Bank sticks to its principle of being “prudent, stable and 
neutral”, focuses on the core of risk prevention and control, 
grasps the dynamics of the information age, and enhances 
the development of its management system. More specifically, 
the Bank tries to develop an internal control and compliance 
system featuring “Machinery + System + Culture”, adopts a sys-
tem-based approach to transform its management process and 
improve the quality and efficiency of decision-making. Moreover, 
CGB applies a market-based approach to adjusting its organi-
zation, with an aim to stimulate its internal drive, consolidate the 
foundation for development and make progress with a down-to-
earth attitude.宏觀政策與金融市場(cid:3100)(cid:1107)(cid:3202)(cid:683)(cid:100)(cid:661)(cid:2615)(cid:4028)(cid:1860)(cid:4880)(cid:3645)(cid:1625)(cid:2508)(cid:1857)(cid:1857)(cid:3332)(cid:1393)(cid:5538)(cid:2564)(cid:661)(cid:1484)(cid:1625)(cid:2988)(cid:4038)(cid:1857)

n050本行在信息化發展新速度下，充分發揮科技創新和
變革先導作用，持續加大科技投入，形成內部創新
合力，鞏固已有創新優勢，力爭在前沿領域創出特
色。
In response to the speedy information development, the Bank 
fully taps into the pioneering role of technological innovation and 
reform, by continuously increasing its technological investment 
for synergetic internal innovation and consolidating the existing 
innovation merits, all in an effort to create a niche in the frontier

e117本行立足自身發展新階段，積極建立良好制度文化，以“創新、包
容、奮進”為核心，以“基礎建設、科技引領”為支持，以強化執
行問責為綱領，逐步積澱全新文化體系，凝心聚氣，塑造堅穩發展
軟實力。Based on the new stage of its development, the Group is active in developing 
robust institutional culture, which is centered on “innovation, inclusiveness and 
progressiveness” and supported by “building the fundamentals and leading with 
technology”. On top of that, the Bank, under its guiding principle of executing 
greater accountability, takes steps to develop a brand-new cultural system through 
accumulation and stays committed to growing its soft power through steady devel-
opment.Ernst & Young Hua Ming LLP
